name: Networkado (camiaalves)
description:
Talk with a lot of people and increase your professional connections. The more business cards you get, the better are your chances of getting an opportunity.
Networkado is the ultimate conference simulator. Get your cards. Lock'n'load.

Developed during the NotGDC Game Jam 2019 (Theme: Game Conference and Events)

Daniel Caldas as Programmer & Camila Alves as Artist.
